issue.title: Move Wire button from left palette to Toolbar icon

content.raw:
We should implement this in mentor2. You can get the toolbar by doing:

~~~
mainWindow->GetRenderWidget()->GetToolbar()
~~~

where mainWindow is of class `MainWindow` that you can get within `CMLEditor`

Gazebo's ModelEditor.cc has [some code snippets](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/61d4e2e62b71c4907cd0f0499f1194767dd8731f/gazebo/gui/model/ModelEditor.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#ModelEditor.cc-124) to add an icon to the toolbar
